attributes.action: instruct officials manning the UK border to smile and say "Welcome Home" whenever a British citizen re-renters the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's important to recognise the hard work of our immigration officials - manning their post every day attempting to ensure that unwelcome visitors to the UK are turned around and sent back to their point of origin. 
I'm sure it's a largely thankless job and can be tiring, repetitive and, at times, stressful.
This isn't an excuse though for these people to be miserable, gruff and sometimes rude when a British citizen just wants to get back into their own country.
I don't think anyone expects marching bands and dancing girls - but wouldn't it be nice to be greeted with a smile and, after relevant checks have been completed, to have one's passport handed back and be told "Welcome Back - have a safe trip home"?
